pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==============django-jsonify==============Abstract--------JSON library for working with django + jsonDonors------- jsonify filter for Django based on http://djangosnippets.org/snippets/201/- @ajax_request decorator from django-annoying https://bitbucket.org/offline/django-annoying (Anderson <self.anderson@gmail.com>)Installation------------To install you can use pip::: pip install django-jsonifyThen add `jsonify` to django settings.INSTALLED_APPSUsage-----If you want to convert varianble in django template, you can use jsonify filter::: {% load jsonify %} {% block content %} <script type="text/javascript"> <![CDATA[ var items = {{ items|jsonify }}; ]]></script> {% endblock %}If you want to return JSON data from view, you can use @ajax_request decorator:: from jsonify.decorators import ajax_request @ajax_request def my_view(request): news = News.objects.all() news_titles = [entry.title for entry in news] return {'news_titles': news_titles}
